title: Implement 'wreckit evolve' command
overview:
Need an automated way to discover and capture improvement opportunities in the codebase without manual identification.

**Motivation:** Acts as the 'Idea Generation' phase of the recursive flywheel, enabling continuous automated discovery of improvements.

**Success criteria:**
- Command analyzes the codebase
- Identifies refactors, missing specs, and optimizations
- Automatically creates new Wreckit items for discovered improvements
